description: Google is proud to boast a network that provides services to millions of Internet users around the globe. As a network engineer you will be responsible for reliability and scale of network infrastructure.
Built In Austin is home for news, job postings, and community events centered around Austin's thriving tech industry. As a Technical Writer you will write articles and manage online content.

CodeDrip is a fictional company created for this activity. We specialize in creating developer tools to make the lives of other developers easy. As a Front End Developer you will be responsible for transitioning our existing AngularJS based website to modern React website.
